long_description: This mod is a library mainly intended for use on Linux servers. It is very practical for handling large amounts of data. To use the mod, you need a PostgreSQL server. Additionally, the mod requires security permissions because it depends on the `luapg.so` file. The file `luapg.c`, which is the source code for `luapg.so`, can also be compiled manually. The command for that is included as a comment at the bottom of `luapg.c`.
name: postgresql
title: PostgreSQL Library
